channel.title: Need help (for clients)
channel.description:
Hey,
Im trying to find a client that i can change the background, text and all.... All the ones I found were broken, so....
Is there a way to maybe change the background on Silab or Moparscape clients? Or does anyone know about a good client that you can modify?
Thanks :D
